individual_metadata.synopsis: Mizora contacts party after she's been captured by the cultists. Not a lot of choices here, but you can try and find out how she got caught and express opinion on getting her out. This version if Wyll is not with you.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter act 2 after recruiting Wyll, but without Wyll in active party, and visit camp repeatedly, or enter town area through any approach while carrying a Moonlantern.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Mizora contacts Wyll after she's been captured by the cultists. Not a lot of choices here, but you can try and find out how she got caught and express opinion on getting her out.
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Enter act 2 and visit camp repeatedly, or enter town area through any approach.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Mizora contacts Wyll after she's been captured by the cultists. Not a lot of choices here, but you can try and find out how she got caught and express opinion on getting her out.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Enter act 2 and visit camp repeatedly, or enter town area through any approach.

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle starts to draw itself on the ground. Out of it rises a hologram of Mizora, though not Mizora herself.

13.speaker: Mizora
13.text: Playtime's over. So perk up your ears - you and the pup have a new mission.

45.speaker: Mizora
45.text: Absolute's cult has gone and grabbed one of Zariel's assets. A devil - and a powerful one at that.

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: They're locked up in the cult's fortress, Moonrise Towers. And you're getting 'em out.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: That's a problem for Wyll, not for me.

51.speaker: Mizora
51.text: Ahem. Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'Should promised soul refuse obeyance or neglect duty, the pact-holder shall cast the promised into Avernus as a lemure.'

50.speaker: Mizora
50.text: I'll make it simple: Wyll fails or refuses, and he turns to a thick blob of stink-flesh and sinks to Avernus.

24.speaker: Mizora
24.text: You either mount a quick rescue, or you condemn Wyll to an eternity sizzling in the Hells.

16.speaker: Mizora
16.text: Sounds like an easy choice to me.

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *Mizora's words may be flippant, but they are tinged with desperation. She cannot afford for Wyll to fail this mission.*

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *This may be your best chance to negotiate Wyll out of his pact.*

46.speaker: Player
46.text: We'll rescue your asset on one condition: you end Wyll's pact.

9.speaker: Mizora
9.text: Interesting. Now why should I go letting my favourite pet off his leash?

39.speaker: Mizora
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: We could always let the cult infect the asset. I bet they'd make a loyal thrall.

30.speaker: Mizora
30.text: Think again. Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

18.speaker: Mizora
18.text: Now get to Moonrise. And do mind the shadows - they've been especially hungry.

49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

48.speaker: Mizora
48.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

20.speaker: Mizora
20.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once the mission's done - not before.

52.speaker: Mizora
52.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *You've heard of this provision - better known as the 'You First' clause.*

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Remember all you can about devils and their contracts.

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *You recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's contract: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.

6.speaker: Mizora
6.text: I've never seen such a fearless display of sheer idiocy. Bravo!

7.speaker: Mizora
7.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Never mind. We'll free Zariel's asset.

27.speaker: Mizora
27.text: Compliance. Just as it should be.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I will make sure it's done.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Forget it. This 'asset' can rot in the Towers for all I care.

33.speaker: Mizora
33.text: I'd start caring - and quick, sunshine.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: If this devil is so powerful, how did they manage to get captured?

25.speaker: Mizora
25.text: Questions, questions - you're wasting my time. Let's see about getting your priorities fixed.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: I'm not lifting another godsdamned finger for a devil.

29.speaker: Mizora
29.text: Karlach, honey. If you won't do it for me, do it for him.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party stops as they walk through shadow-cursed town

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_72.text: Ahh, I love this time of year. The dickheads start popping up wherever you look.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_41.text: I'll make it simple: Wyll fails or refuses, and he turns to a thick blob of stink-flesh and sinks to Avernus.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_48.text: Now be a good boy and play fetch, pup - or you'll spend an eternity sizzling in the Hells.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_20.text: *Mizora's words may be flippant, but they are tinged with desperation. She cannot afford for Wyll to fail this mission.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_16.text: We'll rescue your asset - on one condition.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.text: Oh? And what condition is that?
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.context: NodeContext: Incredulous that the player refused her mission

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_32.text: *Your mind links with Wyll's, drawn in by his increasing panic.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_69.text: Respond to Wyll in your mind. 'Trust me'.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_38.text: Mizora, we'll rescue this asset if you release Wyll from his pact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_17.text: Never mind, Mizora. We'll do as you ask.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.text: You end Wyll's pact and go your separate ways.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_46.text: *A doubtful Wyll catches his breath but says nothing, and your connection fades.*
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and player end mind meld.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.text: Interesting. Now why should I go letting my favourite pet off his leash?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_47.text: Shake your head. Never mind, you'll do as Mizora says.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Narrator

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_27.text: Such a good boy you are - I've trained you well. But a quick review of the rules wouldn't hurt.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_66.text: And this is my problem how, exactly?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Wyll

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Wyll

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Narrator

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Wyll

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_7.text: How about I let the cult infect this devil instead? I bet they'd make a loyal thrall.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.text: Ponder the ins and outs of your contract. Could there be a loophole?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_40.text: *Your own contract is airtight. But you recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's pact: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Narrator

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Wyll
